metadata.title: CVE-2017-9468 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
In Irssi before 1.0.3, when receiving a DCC message without sourcenick/host, it attempts to dereference a NULL pointer. Thus, remote IRCservers can cause a crash.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-9468` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

irssi - 0.8.19-1ubuntu1.4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: irssi package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.8.19-1ubuntu1.4').
